original_text: If he is not able, he will send a delegation while the other is still a long way off and will ask for terms of peace.
korean_text: 만일 못할 터이면 그가 아직 멀리 있을 때에 사신을 보내어 화친을 청할지니라

sentences.original_text: while the other is still a long way off
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 쪽이 아직 멀리 떨어져 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and will ask for terms of peace
